#summary Front page

The purpose of this tool is to make documentation generation easy, nice and available in
(m)any formats.

== Features ==

  * rst -> xml conversion
  * xml -> docbook conversion
  * docbook -> latex conversion
  * docbook -> html conversion

== Why another conversion tool? ==

[WhyXML]
